turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: hi, how can i help you?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I'd like to get a beverage at my local Starbucks.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: okay, what would you like to order?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I'd like to order a black and white mocha.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: a short.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: sure, what size?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: you got it. what type of milk do you prefer?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: 2% milk.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: any whipped cream?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: No, thank you.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: would you like to order anything else?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Nope. That's it.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: great. from which starbucks would you like to pick up your coffee?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: It's going to be at 402 College Ave in Ithaca, New York.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: so i just to make sure i have everything: tall black and white mocha, with 2% milk, no whipped cream. is this correct?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: No, I'd like a short, not a tall mocha.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: okay, thank you for confirming that. so a short black and white mocha, with 2% milk, no whipped cream. did i get it right this time?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yes, that's correct.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: thank you! and you are picking it up from the starbucks at 402 college avenue in ithaca, correct?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: That's right.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: great! your coffee will be ready soon! you will receive a text message with your receipt.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: (deleted)

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Awesome. Thank you.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: you're welcome, enjoy!

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: bye.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Goodbye.
